LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Fruition.label: 果位
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Cultivation.label: 修行
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_ZenSound.label: 禅音
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_ZenSound.description: 听到了禅音, 感到内心平静
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Feed.label: 喂养
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_KeenEyes.label: 慧眼
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_RecognizeTruth.label: 识真
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Imprisonment.label: 禁锢
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Unshakeable.label: 不动如山
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Unshakeable.description: 佛法护佑，似有神庇，邪祟难侵
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Dizzy.label: 头晕耳鸣
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_Dizzy.description: 被巨大的声音震得头晕耳鸣，难以集中精神
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_WeaponDrop.label: 兵器脱手
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_He_TerrorScream.label: 恐怖嘶吼
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_He_TerrorScream.description: 听到了恐怖的吼叫，感到恐惧
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_He_NightmareGaze.label: 噩梦凝视
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_He_NightmareGaze.description: 感觉被一个恐怖的存在盯上，眼中/传感器中传来的一切，都变成了扭曲的幻象
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_He_PustuleCorrosion.label: 脓疮腐蚀
LanguageData.NzRI_Zd_He_PustuleCorrosion.description: 被脓疮覆盖，感到剧烈的恶心
